song.eTitle: Lord Jesus, Once You Spoke to Men

verses.verse: Lord Jesus, once You spoke to men Upon the mountain and the plain, O help us listen now as then And wonder at Your words again.
We all have secret fears to face, Our minds and motives to amend. We seek Your truth, we need Your grace, Our living Lord and present friend.
The gospel speaks; and we receive Your light, Your love, Your own command. O help us live what we believe, In daily word of heart and hand.
